SELECT CASE WHEN school = '전산전자공학부' AND (major_1 LIKE '컴퓨터공학(%)' OR major_1 LIKE 'AI·컴퓨터공학심화(%)' OR major_1 LIKE '전자공학심화(%)' OR major_1 LIKE '전자공학(%)') THEN '전공'
WHEN school = '글로벌리더십학부' AND major_1 LIKE 'AI·컴퓨터공학심화(%)' THEN '1학년'
WHEN major_2 LIKE '컴퓨터공학(%)' OR major_2 LIKE 'IT(%)' OR major_2 LIKE 'ICT융합(%)' OR major_2 LIKE 'AI Convergence & Entrepreneurship(%)' OR major_2 LIKE '데이터사이언스(%)' THEN '융합'
WHEN major_1 LIKE 'IT(%)' OR major_1 LIKE 'ICT융합(%)' OR major_1 LIKE 'AI Convergence & Entrepreneurship(%)' THEN '융합'
WHEN (major_1 LIKE '생명과학(%)' OR major_1 LIKE '경영(%)' OR major_1 LIKE '경제(%)') AND major_2 = 'AI융합' THEN '융합'
ELSE '기타' END FROM _sw_student WHERE school = #{school} AND major_1 = #{major1} AND (major_2 = #{major2} OR major_2 IS NULL) LIMIT 1
